title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-Based Mathematics Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Middle School-Level Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Project-Based Learning
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners design math project proposals incorporating three or more diverse representation methods in accordance with UDL principles.
Learners refine engagement strategies in their project designs by at least two levels by reflecting on peer feedback.
Learners create and share UDL-applied math activity materials using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
